> [!NOTE] > Currently processing new changes in this PR. This may take a few minutes, please wait... > >
> ≡ƒôÑ Commits > > Reviewing files that changed from the base of the PR and between ae0b45e5f6da2a3faadf14868030d162a0969e62 and c1c586fb3828dea722e56e401a675ecf0b54f694. > >
> >
> ≡ƒôÆ Files selected for processing (8) > > * `convex/OTPVerification.ts` > * `convex/e2e.ts` > * `convex/router.ts` > * `e2e/auth.spec.ts` > * `e2e/config.ts` > * `e2e/utils/auth-helpers.ts` > * `e2e/utils/otp-helpers.ts` > * `e2e/utils/test-user-service.ts` > >

Once a human tester finds a bug, it should be the last time a human tester finds that bug. Automatic tests should check for it from then on. > > -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- > \ > \ (\__/) > (ΓÇóπààΓÇó) > / πÇÇ πüÑ > ``` > > Γ£Å∩╕Å Tip: You can disable in-progress messages and the fortune message in your review settings.
≡ƒô¥ Walkthrough ## Walkthrough Cross-cutting rename from "company" to "organization" across schema, Convex backend, frontend hooks/components, routes, and tests; adds OrgContext and workspaceMembers; introduces Convex query getFocusTask and Dashboard UI components (FocusZone, Greeting) wired to that query; replaces ROUTE_PATTERNS with a structured ROUTES object. ## Changes | Cohort / File(s) | Change Summary | |---|---| | **Schema & DB**
`convex/schema.ts`, `convex/purge.ts` | Rename tenant tables/fields/indices from `companies`ΓåÆ`organizations` (`companyId`ΓåÆ`organizationId`, `companyMembers`ΓåÆ`organizationMembers`); add `workspaceMembers`; update purge targets. | | **Core Convex: Organizations & RBAC**
`convex/organizations.ts`, `convex/e2e.ts`, `convex/lib/batchHelpers.ts` | Replace company APIs with organization equivalents (create/update/delete/getOrganization); update RBAC, e2e setup/cleanup, and batch helper signatures to organizations. | | **Convex: Auth / Onboarding / Invites / Users**
`convex/auth.ts`, `convex/onboarding.ts`, `convex/invites.ts`, `convex/users.ts` | Switch lookups/payloads and membership checks to organization scope; add explicit return schemas for many endpoints; `defaultCompanyId` ΓåÆ `defaultOrganizationId`. | | **Convex: Projects / Teams / Workspaces / Templates / Access**
`convex/projects.ts`, `convex/teams.ts`, `convex/workspaces.ts`, `convex/projectTemplates.ts`, `convex/projectAccess.ts` | API args/returns and access checks now use `organizationId`; admin checks use `isOrganizationAdmin`; exported names adjusted (e.g., `getOrganizationTeams`). | | **Convex: New Query**
`convex/dashboard.ts` | Added `getFocusTask` ΓÇö authenticates user, queries issues by assignee, filters deleted/done, ranks by priority + recency, enriches with projectName/projectKey, returns top task or null. | | **Frontend Context & Hooks**
`src/hooks/useCompanyContext.tsx` (removed), `src/hooks/useOrgContext.tsx` (added), `src/routes/_auth/_app/route.tsx` | Remove CompanyContext; add OrgContext with `useOrganization`/`useOrganizationOptional`; root layout/provider wired to organizations. | | **Routing & Route Helpers**
`convex/shared/routes.ts`, `src/config/routes.ts`, many `src/routes/_auth/_app/$orgSlug/...` | Replace flat `ROUTE_PATTERNS` with structured `ROUTES` (path + build); migrate `$companySlug` ΓåÆ `$orgSlug` across route files and consumers. | | **Frontend Dashboard & UI additions**
`src/components/Dashboard.tsx`, `src/components/Dashboard/FocusZone.tsx`, `src/components/Dashboard/Greeting.tsx`, supporting files | Dashboard layout refreshed; add FocusZone and Greeting components; integrate `api.dashboard.getFocusTask`; adjust dashboard to org context. | | **Frontend Components & Props**
many `src/components/*` (Admin, Sidebar, Modals, Onboarding, ProjectSettings, TimeTracking, etc.) | Update components to use `useOrganization`/orgSlug/organizationId and `ROUTES`; rename props (`companySlug`ΓåÆ`orgSlug`); mutation targets to `api.organizations.*`. | | **Frontend Navigation / Utilities**
`src/components/AppSidebar.tsx`, `src/components/CommandPalette.tsx`, `src/config/keyboardShortcuts.ts` | Update navigation, command palette, and keyboard shortcuts to use `orgSlug`/`organizationId` and the new `ROUTES` shape. | | **Tests & Test Utilities**
`convex/*.test.ts`, `e2e/*`, `convex/testUtils.ts`, many frontend tests | Update tests and helpers to organization terminology (`createOrganizationAdmin`, `organizationId`); e2e fixtures/endpoints updated to org naming. | | **Package & Tooling**
`package.json`, `biome.json`, `scripts/check-arbitrary-tailwind.cjs` | Dependency bumps; Biome schema version bumped and routeTree.gen.ts override added; minor formatting tweak. | | **Docs / TODOs / Research**
`TODO.md`, `research/TODO_AGENCY_NICHE.md` | TODO reorganized for pivot; `research/TODO_AGENCY_NICHE.md` removed. | ## Sequence Diagram(s) ```mermaid sequenceDiagram participant UI as Dashboard UI participant ConvexAPI as Convex Query Layer participant ConvexDB as Convex DB participant Router as Client Router UI->>ConvexAPI: api.dashboard.getFocusTask() ConvexAPI->>ConvexDB: query issues by_assignee index (filter deleted/done) ConvexDB-->>ConvexAPI: candidate issues list ConvexAPI->>ConvexAPI: sort by priority map, tie-break by recency ConvexAPI->>ConvexDB: fetch project doc for chosen task (if projectId) ConvexDB-->>ConvexAPI: project doc|null ConvexAPI-->>UI: return focusTask (task + projectName/projectKey) or null UI->>Router: on FocusZone click -> navigate to ROUTES.projects.board.path({ orgSlug, key }) ``` ## Estimated code review effort ≡ƒÄ» 5 (Critical) | ΓÅ▒∩╕Å ~120 minutes ## Possibly related PRs - NixeloApp/cascade#74 ΓÇö overlaps `convex/shared/routes.ts` and ROUTES restructuring; likely direct conflict on route shape. - NixeloApp/cascade#71 ΓÇö overlaps auth redirect logic and ROUTES usage; related to auth/getRedirectDestination edits. - NixeloApp/cascade#63 ΓÇö touches e2e RBAC fixtures and test scaffolding; likely overlap with organization naming and RBAC test changes. ## Poem > ≡ƒÉç I hopped through slugs and changed the name, > company to organization ΓÇö tidy the frame. > A FocusZone sparkles with one task to do, > routes rebuilt, org context fresh and new. > Tiny rabbit cheers ΓÇö the code hops through!
≡ƒÜÑ Pre-merge checks | Γ£à 1 | Γ¥î 2
Γ¥î Failed checks (1 warning, 1 inconclusive) | Check name | Status | Explanation | Resolution | | :----------------: | :------------- | :--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | | Docstring Coverage | ΓÜá∩╕Å Warning | Docstring coverage is 44.87% which is insufficient. The required threshold is 80.00%. | Write docstrings for the functions missing them to satisfy the coverage threshold. | | Title check | Γ¥ô Inconclusive | The PR title 'Fixes' is vague and does not convey meaningful information about the changeset. It fails to describe the primary change or provide any specific context. | Update the title to be more descriptive. Example: 'Migrate from company to organization terminology' or 'Refactor company context to organization context' to clearly indicate the main change. |

≡ƒñû Fix all issues with AI agents ``` In `@convex/dashboard.ts`: - Around line 331-332: The getFocusTask Convex query is missing a returns validator; update the query declaration for getFocusTask to include a suitable returns validator (e.g., returns: v.null() if it intentionally returns nothing, or returns: v.union(v.null(), v.type({...})) / a specific v.type(...) that matches your issues document if it returns an enriched issue object), placing the validator alongside args in the query({ args: {}, returns: ... }) call and adjust the object schema to match the actual shape of your issues documents (fields and types) if you choose the enriched-issue return option. - Line 341: The filter is using a hardcoded status string ("done") which can be incorrect; update the query logic in the function that builds uncompletedIssues to mirror getMyStats: fetch the user's accessible projects and their workflow states, build a Set of status IDs where state.category === "done", then replace the q.neq(q.field("status"), "done") check with a membership test against that Set (i.e., exclude issues whose status is in the done-status set). Also ensure you sort uncompletedIssues (not the whole issues array) before returning. Reference functions/symbols: getMyStats, uncompletedIssues, notDeleted, q.field("status"), q.neq. In `@convex/invites.ts`: - Around line 10-19: isOrganizationAdmin currently uses .filter() and checks any organization; change it to accept organizationId and userId and query organizationMembers using the by_organization_user index (use ctx.db.query("organizationMembers").withIndex("by_organization_user", q => q.eq("organizationId", organizationId).eq("userId", userId)).first()) instead of .filter(), returning true only if that record exists; update all call sites: pass args.organizationId from sendInvite, verify invite.organizationId in revokeInvite and resendInvite, and scope listInvites and listUsers to a specific organizationId when querying; finally, add missing returns validators to the Convex functions sendInvite, revokeInvite, resendInvite, listInvites, and listUsers. In `@convex/onboarding.ts`: - Around line 89-93: The createSampleProject mutation is missing a Convex returns validator; update the mutation declaration for createSampleProject to include returns: v.id("projects") alongside the existing args validator (i.e., mutation({ args: { organizationId: v.optional(v.id("organizations")) }, returns: v.id("projects"), handler: async (ctx, args) => { ... } })) so the function explicitly validates that it returns a project ID. In `@convex/router.ts`: - Around line 18-20: The config key updateCompanySettings in e2e/config.ts is still pointing to the old route; rename it to updateOrganizationSettings and update its value to use CONVEX_SITE_URL with the new path "/e2e/update-organization-settings" (i.e. change the entry from updateCompanySettings: `${CONVEX_SITE_URL}/e2e/update-company-settings` to updateOrganizationSettings: `${CONVEX_SITE_URL}/e2e/update-organization-settings`) and then update any E2E tests that reference config.updateCompanySettings to use config.updateOrganizationSettings so they point to the new endpoint defined in convex/router.ts. In `@src/components/Dashboard/FocusZone.tsx`: - Around line 45-84: The Card component is only mouse-clickable; add keyboard and ARIA support by making the Card focusable and operable via keyboard: add tabIndex={0} and role="button" to the Card element, ensure the existing handleClick is also invoked from an onKeyDown handler that listens for Enter and Space (calling preventDefault for Space), and provide a descriptive aria-label (or aria-labelledby) for screen readers; also ensure visible focus styles are present (or use an accessible focus-visible class) so keyboard users can see focus on the Card. In `@src/components/Dashboard/MyIssuesList.test.tsx`: - Around line 14-17: The mock for the org hook exports the wrong symbol name: replace the incorrect export "useorganization" with the properly cased "useOrganization" in the vi.mock call for the "@/hooks/useOrgContext" module so the mock matches the real hook name and returns the same shape (e.g., { orgSlug: "test-organization" }) used by components that call useOrganization. In `@src/components/Dashboard/ProjectsList.test.tsx`: - Around line 81-86: The test in ProjectsList.test.tsx is asserting the wrong empty-state strings; update the assertions to match the component's actual EmptyState values: render the same component (WorkspacesList/ProjectsList as used in the test) with projects={[]} and assert that screen.getByText("No projects") and screen.getByText("You're not a member of any projects yet") are in the document so the test matches the implementation in ProjectsList.tsx. - Around line 14-18: Fix the mock export and constant naming: change the mocked hook export from useorganization to useOrganization so it matches the real hook name, and rename the TEST_COMPANY_SLUG constant to TEST_ORG_SLUG; update every usage of TEST_COMPANY_SLUG (e.g., the assertions/props that reference the slug) to use TEST_ORG_SLUG and ensure the vi.mock call returns { useOrganization: () => ({ orgSlug: TEST_ORG_SLUG }) } to keep names consistent with the actual hook and test expectations. In `@src/components/IssueDetailModal.test.tsx`: - Around line 20-27: The mocked hook name is incorrectly casedΓÇöchange the mock export key from "useorganization" to the correct "useOrganization" so the test uses the mock instead of the real hook; update the vi.mock for "@/hooks/useOrgContext" to export useOrganization as a vi.fn that returns the orgSlug, organizationName, and billingEnabled values used in IssueDetailModal.test.tsx. In `@src/components/ProjectsList.test.tsx`: - Around line 7-12: The mock for the organization hook has incorrect casingΓÇöchange the mocked export name from useorganization to useOrganization so it matches the real hook; update the vi.mock block that currently returns useorganization: () => ({ organizationId: "organization-123", orgSlug: "test-organization" }) to export useOrganization instead, ensuring the test uses the mocked hook rather than invoking the real one. In `@src/components/UserMenu.test.tsx`: - Around line 37-44: The mock in the vi.mock call exports the wrong symbol name; rename the mocked export from useorganization to useOrganization (matching the component's import) and return the same shape (organizationId, orgSlug, organizationName, userRole) so the mock is applied; update the mock object inside the vi.mock for the "@/hooks/useOrgContext" module to export useOrganization with the existing mock values. ```

src/components/landing/Footer.tsx-42-44 (1)
`42-44`: **Consider capitalizing the heading for consistency.** Other column headings are title-cased (ΓÇ£ProductΓÇ¥, ΓÇ£ResourcesΓÇ¥), so this lowercase label looks inconsistent. If not intentional, capitalize it.

convex/users.ts-94-116 (1)
`94-116`: **Fix grammar and avoid `.filter()` in query.** 1. Line 95: Change "a organization" to "an organization" 2.
